abstract: British Muslim family bound for Disneyland is prevented from boarding plane in London by American Customs agents, provoking broad outrage; some question whether Donald J Trump's widely denounced proposal to bar Muslims from entering United States is in fact being implemented.
lead_paragraph: The passengers said American officers at Gatwick Airport near London did not give a reason for denying them permission to board a flight to Los Angeles.

headline.main: Barring of British Muslim Family Flying to Disneyland Touches Nerve
headline.print_headline: U.S.’s Barring of Muslims From Flight Vexes Britain

snippet: The passengers said American officers at Gatwick Airport near London did not give a reason for denying them permission to board a flight to Los Angeles.
